name: 2018/10/17 Lunch with Adobong Sitaw
description: This high-protein, low-sugar meal is a health-conscious option for those looking to enjoy a nutritious yet delicious lunch. Combining Adlai Rice, eggs, and boneless milkfish, this recipe caters to anyone aiming for a wholesome dietary choice without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold running water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, then set aside. This should take about 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a bowl and lightly beat them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the boneless milkfish (Bangus) fillets with a little salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet, heat some oil over medium heat and cook the beaten eggs until fully set, then remove from the pan and set aside, approximately 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet, add a little more oil if necessary and cook the seasoned milkfish until golden brown on both sides, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the cooked eggs into strips and serve them on a plate along with the cooked Adlai Rice and the golden brown milkfish. Enjoy your nutritious lunch!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
